medium: Bleached and toned gelatin silver print (mounted to board)
inscribed:
Inscribed in pencil, recto below lower left corner of image:  SOLEIL–
Signed and dated in pencil, recto below lower right corner of image:  JEAN * PIERRE  SUDRE * 1976 –   2/2 –  
Blind stamp, recto below lower right corner of image
Stamped/inscribed in ink on label applied verso lower right corner:  PHOTOGRAPHIE ORIGINALE // JEAN-PIERRE SUDRE // TITRE:  SOLEIL – 1976 // 2/2 – LACOSTE
